name: Spaghetti and Meatballs
instructions: Boil Water, salt the water, Spaghetti In, Season Beef with Salt and Pepper, Shape into a ball, Fry for 15 minutes and color all sides. Put the sauce in a pot, and cook it for 15 minutes. Drain the pasta, mix it with the sauce. Plate, then meat balls on top

name: Pasta
instructions: Pour the flour, add 4 egg yolks, add a tablespoon of oil. Mix and incorporate all the flour. Then roll it by hand, rest for 10 minutes cover with a plastic wrap.
